Uncommon Jokers are: Bootstraps, Four Fingers, To the Moon, Seltzer, Vampire. Baseball Card is going to be HUGE, with its 7.59x multiplier based on my uncommons. I'm discarding the 10 of Hearts, the 6 of Clubs, and the 5 of Clubs.  The Diamonds and Spades give me some hope of a quick win. I'm going to want to make a flush with that hand.

The Vampire is sitting at 3.5x.  Baseball Card at 7.59x.  That's about 26.5x total.  My Bootstraps gives me +28 mult.  If I can get a flush, my chips will multiply a ton.

I've got the retrigger from the "9 of Spades".  Seltzer will make that trigger 3 times.

My main goal is to win with the hand, and quickly scale Vampire. I should NOT try to get High Card or Pair, because there is no advantage. I just need to get that flush and win.

I have 22 Diamonds in the deck.
